title: “I’m borderline blind”: MrBeast opens up about right eye vision issue after viral X post questions his smile and demeanor
summary_full: Jimmy Donaldson, known as MrBeast, said he is “borderline blind” in his right eye after X users criticized how his eyes look. He explained he must squint to see, even with contacts. The debate grew online, with support and criticism. The discussion started after claims that he reaches 1 billion monthly viewers worldwide.
